description:
For over 50 years, the people of Southern and Central Illinois have turned to Sam C. Mitchell & Associates when they are dealing with the aftermath of an accident resulting in injuries. Our attorneys are proud of the work they do to assist those who are suffering because of someone else's negligence or recklessness, and many clients comment that the attention and individual focus they received at our law firm help them reclaim their dignity and peace of mind following these and other incidents:

  • Auto accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Motorcycle crashes
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Injuries from nursing home neglect such as bed sores
  • Medical mistakes and birth injuries
  • Injuries from defective products
  • Slip-and-fall injuries, dog bites and other premises liability cases

We also assist workers in Illinois who suffer injuries on the job. Our clients can focus on recovering while we handle the complex matters involving workers' compensation insurance, including preparing cases for arbitration. The attorneys at our law firm know the intricacies of workers' compensation law and the looming deadlines you face, and we can recognize if your circumstances also require holding a third party responsible.

If you have suffered serious or life-changing injuries or you have lost a loved one due to another party's negligent, reckless or intentional actions, you do not have to struggle alone with the aftermath. At Sam C. Mitchell & Associates, we are ready to put our more than 100 years of total legal experience to work for you. Schedule your free initial consultation at our West Frankfort law office or opt to meet with us virtually as an additional precaution for your health.
